basics.label: Game Design Intern
basics.summary: I am an aspiring programming professional with experience in concessions management, customer service, and team leadership

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Oversight of documentation and file organization. Level Designer, including enemy, items, and basic layout. Co-Designer for general game mechanics.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Served as mentor to junior team members. Filled out daily paperwork; inventory logs, staff time logs, etc. Oversight of multiple concession stands serving a variety of items.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared food items and cooked on a grill or in fryers. Carefully maintained sanitation, health and safety standards in all work areas. Performed general maintenance duties. Took necessary steps to meet customer needs and effectively resolve food or service issues.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared items according to written or verbal orders while performing extensive multitasking. Cleaned food preparation areas, cooking surfaces, and utensils. Closely followed standard protocols for safe food preparation, assembly, and presentation to ensure customer satisfaction. Assisted manager in ensuring smooth operation of store in all aspects.

skills.name: Food Service
keywords: Working in a fast paced environment
Managing a large volume of orders
Working in a changing environment with diverse team members
Maintaining sanitation and complying with food safety regulations
